    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hex Wellspring](/Feats.aspx?ID=1588) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 105 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Hex Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=1583)

</column>

---

Focus flows from your patron each time you commune with your familiar. You can recover 3 Focus Points when you [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=71) instead of 1 if you have spent at least 3 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused.
